title: The Development of Chinese Literature in the New Era
title_zh: 新时代中国文学的发展
summary_en: This article discusses the development and achievements of Chinese literature in the new era, highlighting its cultural significance and global influence.
summary_zh: 本文探讨了新时代中国文学的发展与成就，强调了其文化意义和全球影响力。
best_quote_en: Chinese literature is embracing the world with more confidence and diversity.
best_quote_zh: 中国文学正以更加自信和多元的姿态拥抱世界。
